title: A bill to establish the Interagency Council on Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors, and for other purposes.
content: Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors Act of 2005 - Establishes in the executive branch the independent Interagency Council on Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors, which shall identify and promote coordination of senior citizen housing, health care, and service needs. Defines senior as an individual 65 years or older. Authorizes FY2005-FY2010 appropriations.
